content: We know perfectly well that he specialized in that language, however we can not allow him to take any sentence written in it, because that is not his native language.
translations: ita:Sappiamo perfettamente che si Ã¨ specializzato in quella lingua, ma non possiamo permettere di prendere qualsiasi frase s
